meanings.definition: The quality or state of being deplorable.
meanings.sent1: The deplorablenesses of the situation left everyone feeling sad.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't ignore the deplorablenesses of the poverty in the area.
meanings.sent3: Despite the deplorablenesses of the weather, they managed to have a good time.
meanings.sent4: The deplorablenesses of the situation weighed heavily on their hearts.
meanings.sent5: The deplorablenesses of the neglect were evident in the abandoned house.

meanings.definition: Actions or circumstances that are deserving of strong disapproval or condemnation.
meanings.sent1: The deplorablenesses of his behavior were unacceptable.
meanings.sent2: They were shocked by the deplorablenesses of the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The deplorablenesses of the prank were not well received by anyone.
meanings.sent4: Her deplorablenesses towards others made her unpopular.
meanings.sent5: The deplorablenesses of the situation called for immediate action.
